alert.note: Alert for Benton (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 6:56AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Benton, southeastern Craig, Delaware and southeastern Ottawa Counties through 730 AM CDT... At 656 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles northwest of Ketchum to 4 miles northeast of Chloeta to Twin Oaks. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Bella Vista... Jay... Grove... Gravette... Decatur... Colcord... Kansas... Bernice... Ketchum... Wyandotte... Maysville... Honey Creek State Park... Bernice State Park... Hiwasse... Cleora... Twin Oaks... Dodge... Cayuga... Lake Eucha State Park... Zena... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
